#summary The basefont element sets the base font size, using the size attribute.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *basefont element*

== Usage ==

[SpecificationHTML4 HTML 4] says, "Font size changes achieved with `font` are relative to the base font size set by `basefont`. If `basefont` is not used, the default base font size is 3."

== Attributes ==

  * [BasefontColorAttribute color]
  * [BasefontFaceAttribute face]
  * [BasefontSizeAttribute size]
